mapper.select: select bp.id as projectId, bp.project_name, bp.leader_id, bp.leader_name, (ifnull(bp.contract_amount, 0) - ifnull(bp.comprehensive_cost, 0)) * ifnull(bp.implement_commission_ratio, 0) / 100 as implementCommission from biz_project as bp where project_status = 20 and del_flag = 0 and not exists( select 1 from biz_project_billing as bpb where bp.id = bpb.project_id and bpb.del_flag = 0 )
